vote.title: Authorize a five-year service price agreement, with five one-year renewal options, for the purchase, installation, maintenance, and support of on-board cameras and a corresponding fleet management system for the Department of Sanitation Services - The Heil Co. dba 3rd Eye, most advantageous proposer of four - Estimated amount of $6,824,974.74 - Financing:  Sanitation Capital Improvement Fund ($2,918,853.88) and Sanitation Operation Fund ($3,906,120.86)
vote.description: Authorize a five-year service price agreement, with five one-year renewal options, for the purchase, installation, maintenance, and support of on-board cameras and a corresponding fleet management system for the Department of Sanitation Services - The Heil Co. dba 3rd Eye, most advantageous proposer of four - Estimated amount of $6,824,974.74 - Financing:  Sanitation Capital Improvement Fund ($2,918,853.88) and Sanitation Operation Fund ($3,906,120.86)
